attacks.name: Gale Thrust
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon moved from your Bench to the Active Spot this turn, this attack does 120 more damage.

attacks.name: G-Max Rapid Flow
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 120 damage to 2 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
